QuestData.Title: Gather the Family
QuestData.Description:
Your friend Kalecgos wishes to speak of ley lines, but preparations must be made for the funeral.
While I meet with him, could you gather the final offerings from around Iskaara and place them in the funeral boat alongside dear old Ponoliak?
I hope you take a moment to enjoy the town, as well! My people will welcome you warmly, especially after your help in Brackenhide.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Funeral Offerings from around Iskaara, then place them in the funeral boat.
QuestData.RewardText: Your friend is very inquisitive! Does he ever take a moment to relax?
